Author: newthhang
Text: Well, is usually 1000-1500 kcal is maintenance calories. It does depend on how much you weight and your height, but it seems kinda impossible to gain 1kg of fat in 1 week while eating around 1000-1500kcal. Water weight, food weight, even if you haven't pooped recently will make it look like you gained. Also, even if that 1kg is actually fat - that doesn't mean that your thigh gap would disappear.

Author: EDProgrammer
Text: You shouldn't worry. You ate a normal amount of calories. Like what your body actually needs. Your weight gain is only water weight. Thats why you still have your thigh gap.
